```{r}
#Importing the dataset
library(readxl)
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/Jeevan/Desktop/Christ University/Statistics/Linear Regression/lab-data8.xlsx")
View(data)
attach(data)
#Linear Regression Model
mlmodel=lm(DeliveryTimeY~NumberOfCasesX1+DistanceX2, data=data)
summary(mlmodel)
#Residual Plots
plot(mlmodel) 
#(i) Data is deviating from normal
#(ii) most frequency used plot to check normality of error term
#(iii) scale location plot ~ deviation of residuals from straight line/information about influential objects
#(iv) 
r=resid(mlmodel) 
r
p=fitted(mlmodel)
p
qqnorm(r) # to plot the q-q plot
```
